alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe County through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carleton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Monroe around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Newport, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Scofield, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, La Salle, Bolles Harbor and Detroit Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
